title: riot junk files
body:
so every now and then i have to reinstall league because after around 4-5 patch updates over 3-4months my riot games folder takes up 7-9 gigs hard drive space 
so everytime that happens i uninstall league delete every single file of league from my computer then reinstall and let it patch and update 
once thats done i check how much space my fresh new install takes up and its always around 3-4 gigs 
anyone have any idea why the game builds up junk files like this ?
